response.original_title: It’s a Teen’s World: Wired for Sex, Lies and Power Trips
response.overview: What price do teenagers pay to be cool, hip and popular in a sexually-charged social world? Whether it’s posting sexy photos and raunchy video on the net, ass-grabbing in the school hallway or spreading explicit gossip that shatters high school lives, harassment is commonplace, even acceptable. Through computer screens, inside all-ages clubs, with candid personal diaries and the teens’ own short dramas about sexual pressures, IT’S A TEEN’S WORLD is an unflinching exposé of three culturally diverse groups of Toronto teens who share what it’s like to navigate a tangled web of sex, lies and power trips.
response.title: It’s a Teen’s World: Wired for Sex, Lies and Power Trips
